attributes.additional_details: i believe that students of schools should be able to wear clothing there religion says they must have along side there school uniform e.g. beakers, skull caps or turbans. they should also be able to style there hair or get body art there religion says they must have e.g. dreadlocks sign and help thank you

rejection.details:
Http://education.gov.uk/schools/leadership/schoolethos/b0014144/schooluniform
It is for the governing body of a school to decide whether there should be a school uniform and other rules relating to appearance, and if so what they should be.
